query: Identify all the objects in the point cloud and provide their positions. Your answer needs to give the object name and the bounding box of the object. The bounding box should be represented as [x1, y1, z1, x2, y2, z2] with floating numbers in unit of meters. These values correspond to the x, y, z coordinate of bounding box center, size of bounding box along x, y, z axis.
